channel.title: Need help making a server, view my second reply
channel.description: I'm sorry if this is a silly question or anything of the sort, but i was wondering, is it still possible to port forward, or more to the point, run a server on a wireless modem? Thanks.

item.title: Need help making a server, view my second reply
item.dc:creator: @Lippy Lippy
item.description:
@Lippy wrote:

Thanks, i’ll add you.[quote=“Got Java?, post:2, topic:128196”]got msn? I’ll teach you over msn. I have taught like 4 people how to[/quote][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2007, 01:15:47 PM[/size][hr]I apologise for the double post, but this seems to be the only way to gain more attention. After some running into a brick wall, i finally realised the appropriate ip address for my 2wire connection, in the browser.
These are the settings that i have used for the forwarding:

But, when i attempt to connect to the server, on the public ip, or 0.0.0.0, it will not allow me to connect.
Also, i spotted this when attempting to run the modified compiler:

If you need more information, just post here.
